Description: Ostracon, fragment of the upper-body of a brown pottery ribbed vessel, with base of one handle surviving, the fabric is partially grey in section, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and very faint traces of a red-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394301) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394301)
